subject: Eu warehouse
description_text:
Dear Simson team,

I'm interested in knowing if, when ordering from Hungary through you, the
shipment comes from an EU warehouse or not, and whether I need to account
for VAT as well. Thank you for your response.

Best regards,
Pörge László

conversations.body_text: Hi László Pörge,  If there is stock in our German warehouse, orders within the EU are shipped from Germany. As a result, orders to EU countries do not incur customs duties.
